sense.gloss: to apply (of a rule), to be applicable (of standards, lessons, ideas, etc.), to hold true (e.g. of a description), to fit, to be suitable (e.g. of a word), to meet (requirements), to fulfill (conditions), to come under (a heading)
to apply, to adapt
to fit (e.g. a pane into a frame), to insert (e.g. a cork), to fasten (a button)
to put on (something that envelops; e.g. a ring, gloves), to place (a hoop) around, to attach (e.g. a hose to a tap)
to pigeonhole (into a particular category), to force (into a mold), to place (restrictions) on
to entrap, to take (someone) in, to set (someone) up, to deceive
to throw into
to have sex, to fuck
to inlay, to insert, to set
to plug in (to a formula), to immerse
to trick, to deceive
to fit, to get into, to go into, to be fitted with (e.g. door with a window)
to be fit for (a job, etc.), to be suited for, to satisfy (conditions)
to fall into, to plunge into, to get stuck, to get caught
to be deceived, to be taken in, to fall into a trap
to get addicted to, to get deep into, to become crazy about, to become stuck on
setting in, inlaying, dovetailing
insertion, inlaying
immersion
to stereotype, to squeeze into a pattern, to regiment
inlay (work), inlaying
inlaid woodwork

sdata.j: そのボルトに↑嵌↑↓はめ↓↑合↑↓あい↓するナットが↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓です。
sdata.e: We need a nut that will fit that bolt.

sdata.j: どうやら↑俺↑↓おれ↓たちは↑罠↑↓わな↓に↑嵌↑↓はま↓まったようだ。
sdata.e: It looks like we fell into a trap.

sdata.j: ↑嵌↑↓は↓められた↑気↑↓き↓がしてならないな。
sdata.e: I can't help but feel that I've been set up.

words.gloss: to apply (of a rule), to be applicable (of standards, lessons, ideas, etc.), to hold true (e.g. of a description), to fit, to be suitable (e.g. of a word), to meet (requirements), to fulfill (conditions), to come under (a heading)
to fit (e.g. a pane into a frame), to insert (e.g. a cork), to fasten (a button)
